smells.name: NestedBlockDepth
smells.description: Excessive nesting leads to hidden complexity. Prefer extracting code to make it easier to understand.

instances.message: Function readObject is nested too deeply.

smells.name: LabeledExpression
smells.description: Expression with labels increase complexity and affect maintainability.

instances.message: Expression with labels increase complexity and affect maintainability.
Expression with labels increase complexity and affect maintainability.

smells.name: LargeClass
smells.description: One class should have one responsibility. Large classes tend to handle many things at once. Split up large classes into smaller classes that are easier to understand.

instances.message: Class MainActivity is too large. Consider splitting it into smaller pieces.
Class MyCanvas is too large. Consider splitting it into smaller pieces.

smells.name: ComplexMethod
smells.description: Prefer splitting up complex methods into smaller, easier to understand methods.

instances.message: The function onOptionsItemSelected appears to be too complex.

smells.name: TooManyFunctions
smells.description: Too many functions inside a/an file/class/object/interface always indicate a violation of the single responsibility principle. Maybe the file/class/object/interface wants to manage to many things at once. Extract functionality which clearly belongs together.

instances.message: Class 'MainActivity' with '40' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'
Class 'MyCanvas' with '21' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'

smells.name: ComplexCondition
smells.description: Complex conditions should be simplified and extracted into well-named methods if necessary.

instances.message: This condition is too complex.
This condition is too complex.

smells.name: EmptyCatchBlock
smells.description: Empty block of code detected. As they serve no purpose they should be removed.

instances.message: This empty block of code can be removed.

smells.name: TooGenericExceptionCaught
smells.description: Caught exception is too generic. Prefer catching specific exceptions to the case that is currently handled.

instances.message: Caught exception is too generic. Prefer catching specific exceptions to the case that is currently handled.
Caught exception is too generic. Prefer catching specific exceptions to the case that is currently handled.
Caught exception is too generic. Prefer catching specific exceptions to the case that is currently handled.

smells.name: UnsafeCallOnNullableType
smells.description: It will throw a NullPointerException at runtime if your nullable value is null.

smells.name: UnsafeCast
smells.description: Cast operator throws an exception if the cast is not possible.

instances.message: canvas.background cannot be safely cast to ColorDrawable.
parcel.readSerializable() cannot be safely cast to MyPath.
my_canvas.background cannot be safely cast to ColorDrawable.
stroke_width_preview.background cannot be safely cast to GradientDrawable.
mLastPaths.clone() cannot be safely cast to LinkedHashMap<MyPath, PaintOptions>.
mPaths.clone() cannot be safely cast to LinkedHashMap<MyPath, PaintOptions>.

smells.name: DataClassContainsFunctions
smells.description: Data classes should mainly be used to store data and should not have any extra functions. (Compiler will automatically generate equals, toString and hashCode functions)

instances.message: The data class PaintOptions contains functions which are not registered conversion functions. The offending method is called getColorToExport

smells.name: WildcardImport
smells.description: Wildcard imports should be replaced with imports using fully qualified class names. Wildcard imports can lead to naming conflicts. A library update can introduce naming clashes with your classes which results in compilation errors.

instances.message: java.io.* is a wildcard import. Replace it with fully qualified imports.
com.simplemobiletools.commons.extensions.* is a wildcard import. Replace it with fully qualified imports.
com.simplemobiletools.commons.extensions.* is a wildcard import. Replace it with fully qualified imports.
android.graphics.* is a wildcard import. Replace it with fully qualified imports.

smells.name: SerialVersionUIDInSerializableClass
smells.description: A class which implements the Serializable interface does not define a correct serialVersionUID field. The serialVersionUID field should be a constant long value inside a companion object.

instances.message: The class SSvg implements the Serializable interface and should thus define a serialVersionUID.
The class SRect implements the Serializable interface and should thus define a serialVersionUID.
The class SPath implements the Serializable interface and should thus define a serialVersionUID.
The class MyPath implements the Serializable interface and should thus define a serialVersionUID.

smells.name: MagicNumber
smells.description: Report magic numbers. Magic number is a numeric literal that is not defined as a constant and hence it's unclear what the purpose of this number is. It's better to declare such numbers as constants and give them a proper name. By default, -1, 0, 1, and 2 are not considered to be magic numbers.

instances.message: This expression contains a magic number. Consider defining it to a well named constant.
This expression contains a magic number. Consider defining it to a well named constant.

smells.name: UnnecessaryParentheses
smells.description: Unnecessary parentheses don't add any value to the code and should be removed.

instances.message: Parentheses in (fullWidth / 2) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: fullWidth / 2
Parentheses in (fullHeight / 2) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: fullHeight / 2

Parentheses in (!mScaleDetector!!.isInProgress && event.pointerCount == 1 && !mWasMultitouch) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: !mScaleDetector!!.isInProgress && event.pointerCount == 1 && !mWasMultitouch
